Articles.Content:
:o :o PREPARE TO BE SHOCKED! :o :o

This 'Thing,' can blow up a space program as easy as pie. Just one day when I was mucking around, I made this.

It only makes it off the launch pad 1/12 times, and is a beast to manoeuvre.

READ THIS

FLIGHT INSTRUCTIONS

Turn on SAS. Fire first stage, then immediately detach. Fire the second stage, and then, as the first two stages start to wobble, SPACE FOR DEAR LIFE!!!! Make sure you don't deploy the parachute. If you survive, you will need it.

Uses stock parts, and the XL Fuel Tank.
